TopicTitle: Pteron Micro Shuttle and rescue vehicle Beta download available(9/9/2014)

Articles.Content: To be honest, the LLL skids are more like skiis than skids...
When it has landing gears, it's caller roller skates. When it has skids, it's called skating shoes.
Guy still MIA?
Yep. Not even one month yet, though. Guess he is busy with real life. I have finished an alpha texturing at the moment, I'm concentrating on my own re-texture project.
Any news? Need. Micro. Shuttle...

Any news? Need. Micro. Shuttle...

Indeed, would go great with the KSO
If it fits in the bay of the KSO (even if it's just the Heavy Lifter), I'll love it!

It might, it's smaller than 2m afaik. Anyway, don't worry, I think. If worst really comes to worst, I'll try something out, import it, or contact Daemoria or something. There will be a way to put this in-game. For now, let's be patient.
Is this still happening? Nothing's been posted for several days and I've been watching with interest. Anything I can do to help?
It's on hold, really. Sage Sagan has been off for quite some time.
I hope this takes less time than the KSO to develop.. I want this mini shuttle so much!

I use R.S.S. so, I'm going to get this when it comes out but...

Going to need to strap to a helluva launch system.

Hey guys, I was assigned for texturing and I got the model for it. Now sage is off for a while and I'm on the verge of taking Pteron apart to import it in game. Still learning the parts since I did not model it. Still looks nice though:

Hey guys, I was assigned for texturing and I got the model for it. Now sage is off for a while and I'm on the verge of taking Pteron apart to import it in game. Still learning the parts since I did not model it. Still looks nice though:

https://i.imgur.com/IYxT5aA.png

huh i thought within the month i gave this it would be a little more "alpha ready" than it is. oh well it still looks good!
Well, nobody actually maintained it. So it had 0 progress. So I might continue it.

Hey guys, I was assigned for texturing and I got the model for it. Now sage is off for a while and I'm on the verge of taking Pteron apart to import it in game. Still learning the parts since I did not model it. Still looks nice though:

https://i.imgur.com/IYxT5aA.png

Looking great so far. I look forward to flying her someday.
I come to this thread literally every day to see if there has been any progress. I'm happy to see that people are still working on it.

I come to this thread literally every day to see if there has been any progress. I'm happy to see that people are still working on it.

You know you can subscribe to threads and get email notifications on new posts in them right?

I come to this thread literally every day to see if there has been any progress. I'm happy to see that people are still working on it.

Same here even though i subbed and get daily email posts about it
when will this be ready for DL?
Long time. I'm not actively working on it and I'm working on it alone. Sage is missing and Daemoria is barely online, busy with his mod.
This is too good to die... Need. Micro. Shuttle.
Seriously don't let this die! Just remodel the WEKA with these textures or something.
I still have the model. I'll be working slowly with it.
